quote: Poverty scrapes these homes down until they all look the same, and they all have in common the absence of things that ought to be there. I might as well have been at one place all my life.
quote_letters: POVERTY SCRAPES THESE HOMES DOWN UNTIL THEY ALL LOOK THE SAME AND THEY ALL HAVE IN COMMON THE ABSENCE OF THINGS THAT OUGHT TO BE THERE I MIGHT AS WELL HAVE BEEN AT ONE PLACE ALL MY LIFE
